item.title: Moderna gets a downgrade from Goldman Sachs on vaccine revenue struggles
item.description: Analyst Salveen Richter downgraded shares of the biotech company from neutral to buy and significantly lowered her price target.

item.title: MicroStrategy is a buy that can gain more than 50% from here, Mizuho says
item.description: The firm initiated the stock with an outperform rating and $515 price target.

item.title: Wednesday’s big stock stories: What’s likely to move the market in the next trading session
item.description: The S&P 500 and the Nasdaq Composite rose on Tuesday as investors snapped up tech shares. Here's what's on CNBC's radar going into Wednesday.

item.title: There’s still value for Nvidia despite DeepSeek threat, says strategist Jay Woods
item.description: Jay Woods of Freedom Capital Markets joined CNBC's "Power Lunch" on Tuesday to offer his take on three key market movers.

item.title: Wall Street analysts universally say buy the dip in anything affected by the DeepSeek sell-off
item.description: Sell-side analysts at major banks are still optimistic on Nvidia and other stocks that fell sharply on Monday.
